mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO MEMBER VALUES(#{mb_id},#{mb_pw},#{mb_area},#{mb_name},DEFAULT) INTO USERS (US_ID,US_ADDRESS,US_PHONE,US_EMAIL,US_POINT) VALUES(#{mb_id},#{us_address},#{us_phone},#{us_email},#{us_point},#{us_image},DEFAULT) INTO AUTHORITIES VALUES(#{authority},#{mb_id}) SELECT * FROM DUAL
